scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These letters and related materials consisting of seven items, 1982 and 1987, were generated by Edward Lay through his research concerning a local architect, Benjamin Charles Baker(? -1955) of " Rosemont, " Albemarle County, Virginia.
The collection also includes notes taken during a telephone conversation with Henderson Heywardon June 25, 1987, concerning Henderson Heyward, William L. Bottomley, Alfred Llorens, and Charley Baker.
